content: of the next 16sts 6hdc in ch5 space half_double_crochet in each of the remaining 8 sts join as before 44sts fasten_off and check the fit on your doll if it is too small try reworking the above in a larger hook and if it is too large try a smaller hook as appropriate hide any loose ends reattach yarn to the back of the top the opposite side to where you fastened off this will avoid having your join in the following rounds at the front of the top rnds 7 9 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join as before 44sts fasten_off and hide loose ends round 1 attach yarn under the arm in centre of the 6hdc s work 16 half_double_crochet evenly around the arm join last st to first with a slip_stitch 16sts round 2 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join as before 16sts fasten_off and hide loose ends worked from the waist down in joined rounds ch36 join last chain to first with a slip_stitch being careful not to twist the chain round 1 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet into each chain around join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 36sts rnds 2 4 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join as before 36sts first leg round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 18sts join as before leaving the last 18sts unworked for the second leg 18sts rnds 6 & 7 feel free to add more or less rounds to each leg as necessary ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join 18sts fasten_off second leg reattach yarn to last unworked st at the back of the trousers as pictured round 1 ch1 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in the next unworked st at the front of the trousers half_double_crochet in each remaining st around join 18sts rnds 2 & 3 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join 18sts fasten_off and hide loose ends there will be hole in the groin area of the trousers simply sew this closed with yarn and a darning needle worked in joined rounds from the top down round 1 magic_ring ch2 not a st from now on work 12dc join 12sts round 2 ch2 work 2dc into each st around join 24sts round 3 ch2 work 2dc into each st around join 48sts round 4 ch2 double_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 2dc into the next st *double_crochet into each of the next 3sts work 2dc into the next st repeat from * around join 60sts rnds 5 8 ch2 double_crochet in each st around join 60sts row 9 ch2 double_crochet in each of the next 54sts leaving the last 6sts unworked turn 54sts row 10 & 11 ch2 double_crochet in each st across now to make the first tie ch26 slip_stitch in the second chain from the hook and in each of the remaining chs back towards the cap single_crochet in each st across to the opposite side now
